unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Festive Rush!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Spark Festive Rush!**

unnormalised: Good news, folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is still offering juicy subsidies on solar rooftop installations, and with Onam just around the corner, it's sparking a mini-boom! Think about it - save money on electricity bills and impress your relatives during the festivities.
normalised: Good news, folks! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is still offering juicy subsidies on solar rooftop installations, and with Onam just around the corner, it's sparking a mini-boom! Think about it - save money on electricity bills and impress your relatives during the festivities.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that applications from Chennai and Kochi have jumped by almost 40% in the last month. Apparently, everyone wants to power their Onam Sadhya feasts (and the air conditioning needed to survive the heat while making it!) with clean energy.
normalised: Word on the street is that applications from Chennai and Kochi have jumped by almost forty percent in the last month. Apparently, everyone wants to power their Onam Sadhya feasts (and the air conditioning needed to survive the heat while making it!) with clean energy.

unnormalised: Under the scheme, you can get subsidies up to Rs. 78,000 for a 3kW system. That's a lot of dosas you could buy with the savings! Plus, think of the bragging rights you'll have over Sharmaji who's still stuck with relying solely on the grid.
normalised: Under the scheme, you can get subsidies up to rupee seventy eight thousand for a three kilowatt system. That's a lot of dosas you could buy with the savings! Plus, think of the bragging rights you'll have over Sharmaji who's still stuck with relying solely on the grid.

unnormalised: Remember though, the deadline is looming, so don't wait until Diwali! Get your applications in now, and maybe treat yourself to some extra biryani with the money you save! Tata Power and Adani Green are offering attractive packages too. Don't miss out!
normalised: Remember though, the deadline is looming, so don't wait until Diwali! Get your applications in now, and maybe treat yourself to some extra biryani with the money you save! Tata Power and Adani Green are offering attractive packages too. Don't miss out!
